ingredients: 1 tablespoon Chinese black vinegar or malt vinegar
1 tablespoon Shaoxing wine or dry sherry
1 pound lean venison, cut into 3/4 inch pieces
2 to 10 dried hot chiles (Sichuan, cayenne, etc)
A 2-inch piece of ginger, peeled and minced (about 2 tablespoons)
1 red bell pepper, cut into matchsticks
